item.title: Hadoop 伪分布式安装
item.description: 添加用户 安装jdk 安装hadoop 添加用户 adduser hadoop passwd hadoop vi /etc/sudoers 添加一行 hadoop ALL=(ALL) ALL su - hadoop 安装jdk sudo tar -zxf jdk-8u121-linux-x64.tar.gz -C /usr/local/ sudo vi /etc/profile > #在文件最后添加 export JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/jdk1.8.0_121 export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin #刷新配置 source /etc/profile now you will be able to see java -version 安装hadoop sudo tar -zxf hadoop-2.8.0.tar.gz -C /usr/local sudo vi /etc/profile #在文件最后添加 export HADOOP_HOME=/usr/local/hadoop-2.8.0 export PATH=$PATH:$HADOOP_HOME/bin #刷新配置 source /etc/profile
